citations.narrative:
A male New Zealand White rabbit, ID# 129861, sustained a closed severely comminuted fracture of his left rear leg from a
limb entrapment in a floor pen during designated exercise time on 12/19/2022. After radiographic examination, the
decision was made to euthanize the rabbit due to the extent of his injury. The use of the exercise pens was discontinued
until safety modifications were completed.
Facilities for rabbits shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair, to protect the animals from injury,
to contain the animals, and to restrict the entrance of other animals.
Corrected by 2/1/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
Additional Inspectors:
MICHAEL TYGART, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
3.50(a)  Critical
   
Facilities, general. 
A male New Zealand White rabbit, ID# 129861, sustained a closed severely comminuted fracture of his left rear leg from a 
limb entrapment in a floor pen during designated exercise time on 12/19/2022. After radiographic examination, the 
decision was made to euthanize the rabbit due to the extent of his injury. The use of the exercise pens was discontinued 
until safety modifications were completed.  
 
Facilities for rabbits shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair, to protect the animals from injury, 
to contain the animals, and to restrict the entrance of other animals. 
 
Corrected by 2/1/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
MICHAEL TYGART, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
